sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove UI policy setting process properties as read-only.</description> <name>PAD: Remove read-only process ui policy</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_policy'); if(gr.get('59f027f8c72010106fb2a0e55cc26096')){ gr.setWorkflow(false); gr.deleteRecord(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-04-02 20:42:33</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5f1c1d9904132010f8771b1ef50e490f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PAD: Remove read-only process ui policy</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core" source="com.glide.pad.core">6be8d7db47220210cd4e1ce4316d4342</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5f1c1d9904132010f8771b1ef50e490f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-02 20:42:33</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: PAD: Remove read-only process ui policy
